reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great replacement part
reviews.reviewText: Product came very quick and was easy to install. Original back plat had tabs broken so was hesitant but this product fit perfect. Am glad there are two so that I have a back up if I break when removing the bell to change batteries. Would order and recommend again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like what came with the camera.
reviews.reviewText: Great value. Easy install. Size is a perfect fit. Stability of the plastic is great,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is an excellent product. Very useful in case anyone needs replacement
reviews.reviewText: This is a good product. Fits well. If anyone wants replacement, it is a good Choice, we are happy and satisfied with this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Item as described and fit our Blink doorbell perfectly and was super easy to install. The box does come with 2 replacements and all hardware, I just already installed one before writing the review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I get angry that I have to change the batteries in my doorbell CONSTANTLY. I'm talking like once a month. It's ridiculous. So in anger one of these past times in having to change the batteries for the umpteenth time I put it back on my door a little too aggressively breaking all the plastic hooks on the original backing. Then I was even angrier at myself for breaking it and thinking I was going to have to buy a whole new doorbell. Until I thought about just replacing that one part. I'm so glad I did. These backings came the next day, were a great price, and are better quality than the original.

reviews.reviewText: As good as OEM. Complete with all hardware.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for outdoor blink doorbell cameras
reviews.reviewText: So sturdy and easy to install!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The main selling point for me was it coming in a 3 pack. The tabs on my original backplate broke when trying to change batteries. These arrived promptly and were an exact fit. Very pleased.

reviews.reviewTitle: I suspect Blink is selling these easily broken backplates like a subscription fee
reviews.reviewText: Every time I replace the battery I forgot how to remove the Blink doorbell camera after inserting the pin... because after inserting the loosely fitted pin it does nothing... it isn't like you feel a click and it unlocks the blink doorbell from the backplate, nooooo you wiggle it and wiggle it.... and nothing.... then you look it up on the internet, push in... and lever it upwards..... crack.... or once the whole blink doorbell goes flying!! I am fairly sure that this design with tiny hook pins are intentional because why else do we have this product... Blink Doorbell Backplate Replacement, Back Plate Part Compatible with Blink Vi... not sure if I should stock up because I think we need a few boxes of these backplates lying around just in case we break the back plate with every change of the batteries. Anyways I had been taping my blink doorbell onto the frame with moving tape for the last year or so and now with the purchase of the Blink Doorbell Backplate Replacement, Back Plate Part Compatible with Blink Vi, once again my Blink Doorbell is installed correctly without tape. PS. If you own the angular blink mount the middle mounting screws to the angular mount are different as I dropped the screw and I thought no problem I got some new screws in the box, but no, they are different. So half hour later I finally found the angular mount screw, thank goodness as I was thinking another year of tape mounted blink doorbell. Anyways this product Blink Doorbell Backplate Replacement, Back Plate Part Compatible with Blink Vi is a valuable product that goes hand in hand with the blink doorbell and I am glad that I found it.

Was nervous that the doorbell wouldn't fit properly as it didn't match the original *exactly*. But it actually held it well with no hassle! Installation was pretty easy. Took me less than 5 minutes with a Phillips screwdriver. Happy there's a second one too in case a replacement is needed later on.
